item.description:
One mind, two bodies...

 

 

"When I attained a certain advanced intimacy with a man, and I don't just mean sex, I married him." -Hedy Lamarr

 

What is true intimacy in a romantic relationship?

 

What are your experiences with intimacy? How can we deepen it? What lessons have you learned on your journey to greater intimacy?

 

How to find the right balance between a healthy intimacy and independence?

 

How is mystery important?  

 

Do men and women differ in their needs for intimacy? Do they express intimacy differently? Sex, is it intimacy?

 

Come join us for an exploration of of intimacy.  For this event we will be gaithering at the couches at The Living Room, in downtown Boston.

 

"It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them. " - Ralph Waldo Emerson

 

 

Date subject to change.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group in couch area.
item.name: Carpe Caffeine: Intimacy & the double flame of life
